    1: from __future__ import annotations
    2: 
    3: from virtualenv.activation.via_template import ViaTemplateActivator
    4: 
    5: 
    6: class FishActivator(ViaTemplateActivator):
    7:     def templates(self):
    8:         yield "activate.fish"
    9: 
   10:     def replacements(self, creator, dest):
   11:         data = super().replacements(creator, dest)
   12:         data.update({
   13:             "__TCL_LIBRARY__": creator.interpreter.tcl_lib or "",
   14:             "__TK_LIBRARY__": creator.interpreter.tk_lib or "",
   15:         })
   16:         return data
   17: 
   18: 
   19: __all__ = [
   20:     "FishActivator",
   21: ]
